Text:
Shoeboxes are no longer in vogue 
 Not even tins with bright paint  
 Memories are uploaded - 
 On drives, phones, desktops.

These things that need preserving 
 Do they know they are to be rescued? 
 What museum would keep these? 
 Traces of youth, proofs of living

Not data, not evidence 
 … but memories! 
 Of children’s laughter  
 And stories under seas of stars. 
 The only thing they do with their time is upload.

The data we upload and store 
 On drives, phones, desks 
 And on drives, phones, desks

The rest of the time, we get bored and go looking for fun. 
I wonder, what should we do with all the data? 
 Our data is a great thing.

It's a great thing if we can use it 
 And make it useful.
 I wonder what kind of useful things! The story of how ?
Use tech you own to spark humanity.
